participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: imaginative and whimsical, she sees the world as a magical place.
participant_1.background: i'm a little girl. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: determined and resilient, he values courage and honor.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
